title: Digital Blended Learning Strategies for Social Education Design Based on HyperDocs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and practical experience in social sector work
context.additional_context: Requires flexible instructional design to maximize learning efficiency in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments, with the goal of strengthening competency in developing customized content reflecting practitioners' experiences

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more social studies educational materials using the HyperDocs template.
Learners can apply strategies to improve learner engagement by 20% or more in a digital blended learning environment.
Learners can discover and repurpose ten or more open educational resources (OER) accessible via smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
